Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates, 180 days after enactment of this Act, the authority of the Secretary of Energy (formerly subject to congressional veto) to contract with any person who generates or holds title to high-level radioactive waste or spent nuclear fuel for the acquisition and disposal of such waste or fuel, unless the exercise of such authority is approved by an enactment of Congress before such deadline.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.
